Package gobblin.scheduler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseGobblinJob  
    JobScheduler
    Gobblin job scheduler.
    JobScheduler.GobblinJob
    A Gobblin job to be scheduled.
    PathAlterationListenerAdaptorForMonitor
    Inner subclass of PathAlterationListenerAdaptor for implementation of Listen's methods, avoiding anonymous class
    SchedulerDaemon
    A class that runs the JobScheduler in a daemon process for standalone deployment.
    SchedulerService
    A Service wrapping a Quartz Scheduler allowing correct shutdown of the scheduler when JobScheduler fails to initialize.
